text: Kɨ men amamangatɨzɨ, me uari uan aseba bagha ofabagh amua nan damazimɨn bar mɨze. Egha kɨ men amamangatɨzɨ me uan otarir ivariaba isa aseba bagha me mɨsogha ofabagh ami. Nan nɨghnɨzim kamakɨn, me ti arazir kurar kabar amuva, bar dɨgavir kuram damigh uan arazir kaba bar da ategham. Egh me fogh suam, kɨrara kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God.”
